arts.ttl: David Beckham can't hide true feelings on where Man Utd are now - 'It's painful'
arts.sum: Manchester United legend David Beckham won the Champions League with the club in 1999 but has seen the multiple Premier League champions miss out on the competition again this season

arts.ttl: Micah Richards leaves CBS Sports panel in tears over David Beckham's 'sticky stuff'
arts.sum: Micah Richards enjoyed his time with David Beckham during CBS Sports' Champions League coverage and reflecting on his time with the England legend sparked hysterics in the studio

arts.ttl: Inter Miami team news: Is Lionel Messi playing against Atlanta United?
arts.sum: Inter Miami conceded an early goal against Philadelphia Union in Messi’s comeback game but the Argentine grabbed a quick-fire brace to put his team ahead and set up his old friend Luis Suarez in the dying moments. Messi looks back to top form for Miami and head coach Tata Martino confirmed that his captain would be included in the squad for trips to Atlanta United and New York City FC.

arts.ttl: Alan Shearer backs David Beckham to invest in English club after Birmingham City visit
arts.sum: England legend Alan Shearer wants to see his former international team-mate David Beckham invest his millions in a side closer to home after helping fire-up Inter Miami

arts.ttl: David Beckham stunned by Wrexham and Birmingham City fans as he helps Tom Brady
arts.sum: David Beckham was in attendance at St Andrew's on Monday night as Birmingham City beat Wrexham 3-1 in front of a packed out attendance in the Championship

arts.ttl: ‘Incredible’ – David Beckham hails Birmingham City and Wrexham supporters

arts.ttl: David Beckham kick-starts punditry career after agreeing new TV role in America
arts.sum: David Beckham has agreed to a deal with Paramount+ that will see him star in an alternative Champions League broadcast, with the show set to resemble the popular 'ManningCast'

arts.ttl: David Beckham gives Kate Abdo personal gift with four-word message
arts.sum: David Beckham surprised CBS's Champions League studio by making a guest appearance on Tuesday, and he came bearing gifts for host Kate Abdo and her fellow pundits

arts.ttl: David Beckham gives perfect response to favourite pundit after Micah Richards question
